Metadata: Kallolide A, a new antiinflammator​y diterpenoid, and related lactones from the Caribbean octocoral "Pseudopterogor​gia kallos" (Bielschowsky)

Four new representatives of the rare pseudopterane skeleton are reported from the Caribbean gorgonian "Pseudopterogor​gia kallos". The structure of the sole crystalline metabolite, kallolide A acetate, was provided by single- crystal X-ray diffraction analysis. Structures for kallolides A-C were subsequently established on the basis of spectral analyses and chemical interconversion​s. Kallolide A, the major metabolite, shows potent antiinflammator​y activity.
